'''Mimetic Replication''' is a part of the [[A Parade of Providence]] event in Version 3.6. Complete ''[[Mimetic Replication]]'' to unlock the event segment.

==Tutorial==
;Weasel
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial A Parade of Providence Mimetic Replication 1a.png
|text1  = Use "Jump" at the right moment and control the weasel model to obtain coins at the appropriate {{Color|help|rhythm point}}. Use "Leap" to reach coins at a higher location.
}}

;Weasel Lag Calibration
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial A Parade of Providence Mimetic Replication 1b.png
|text1  = Manipulate the animal models and cause them to make movements according to the {{Color|help|rhythms}}.<br>Calibrate your lag so that you can follow the rhythm and control the animal models with precision.
}}

;Shroomboar
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial A Parade of Providence Mimetic Replication 2a.png
|text1  = Use "Forward Charge" at the right moment to cause the Shroomboar model to break the obstacle at the appropriate {{Color|help|rhythm point}}.
}}

;Shroomboar Lag Calibration
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial A Parade of Providence Mimetic Replication 2b.png
|text1  = Manipulate the animal models and cause them to make movements according to the {{Color|help|rhythms}}.<br>Calibrate your lag so that you can follow the rhythm and control the animal models with precision.
}}

;Fish
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial A Parade of Providence Mimetic Replication 3a.png
|text1  = Use "Leap From Water" at the right moment and control the fish model so that the {{Color|help|duration of its jump}} matches that of the other two fish models.
}}

;Fish Lag Calibration
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial A Parade of Providence Mimetic Replication 3b.png
|text1  = Manipulate the animal models and cause them to make movements according to the {{Color|help|rhythms}}.<br>Calibrate your lag so that you can follow the rhythm and control the animal models with precision.
}}
